data.name: Spiritlink Tactics
data.detailed_description:
Spiritlink Tactics is a story driven, tactical turn-based RPG. Lead your party of mercenaries through strategic battles! Build powerful characters with this game's intricate multiclass system.

Lead your Party in Strategic Combat!

Position smartly to take advantage of each battle's terrain. Choose your spells wisely with the game's mana sharing mechanic. Experiment and discover powerful party combinations.


Train Powerful Characters!

Deep multi-class system that rewards player creativity. Explore endless class combinations, each with their own unique skill tree, and discover your most powerful party.


Journey through a Rich Story

An epic tale with dozens of story encounters. Tons of optional missions to get sidetracked to!

data.short_description: Spiritlink Tactics is a story driven, tactical turn-based RPG. Lead your party of mercenaries through strategic battles! Customize each party member with numerous classes and skills!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 @ 2.4 GHz, AMD FX 8120 @ 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 630 / 650m, AMD Radeon HD6570 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
